snippet: The state's new guidelines aim to keep parolees from returning to prison for minor infractions, but for one Harlem man, the changes came too late.
abstract: The state's new guidelines aim to keep parolees from returning to prison for minor infractions, but for one Harlem man, the changes came too late.

headline.main: Rules May Help Parolees Avoid Jail for Small Errors
headline.print_headline: State Loosens Leash on Parolees, So Fewer Are Rejailed
